content: set consists of crochet drops men s hat and neck warmer with double_crochet in karisma ** go to the dover neck warmer pattern here 1 ** drops design pattern no u-807 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- hat size s/m l/xl head circumference 57/59 59/62 cm / 22½ /23 1/4 - 23 1/4 /24½ materials drops karisma from garnstudio 50 g for both sizes in color no 16 dark gray 50 g for both sizes in color no 21 medium gray drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or size needed to get 18 double_crochet x 9 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/174-7-dover-neck-warmer
